declarations.name: FormShowIfElement
declarations.description: Web component that enables you to make one HTML form field show (or not) based on the value(s) of another field.

attributes.name: conditions
attributes.description: A double pipe (||) separated list of `name`/`value` pairs that, if true, would make this field show

attributes.name: disabled-class
attributes.description: An optional attribute declaring the `class` to use when the field is disabled. Used in lieu of the `hidden` attribute.

attributes.name: enabled-class
attributes.description: An optional attribute declaring the `class` to use when the field is enabled.
